Construye tu árbol genealógico y descubr: Build your family tree and discover the most important moments of your history.
Enjoy your heritage and live the history.
Compártelo con los miembros de tu famili: Share it with your family members.
Es muy sencillo, ingresa primero tus dat: It's very simple, first enter your data and then you can add your parents, grandparents, siblings, children and other relatives. Once added, you can invite them to participate in your tree and share information, images and documents of their history.
¿Tienes un árbol en otro sitio?: Do you have a tree somewhere else?
¡Tráelo para acá! Esta plataforma trabaj: Bring it here! This platform works with Gedcom data format, the shared standard of major genealogical databases, so if you have records on other platforms, you can easily import their information to
You choose who to share with.
Tu información es tuya y no saldrá de es: Your information is yours and will not leave this site. You can choose to share it with your family and the community. Only those you authorize can view it.
Mi Familia is free to use.
es gratuito para todos los usuarios y su: is free for all users and their families.
Bienvenido a Mi Familia, una plataforma: Welcome to Mi Familia, an open-source genealogical platform. We are committed to protecting the privacy of our users and the information they share on our platform.
Esta política describe cómo recopilamos,: This policy describes how we collect, use, store and protect your personal information.
Recopilamos los siguientes tipos de info: We collect the following types of information:
nombres, fechas de nacimiento y defunció: names, birth and death dates, places, family relationships, photographs.
región de herencia, pueblo de origen, in: heritage region, town of origin, migration information.
Proporcionar y mantener el servicio de l: Provide and maintain the genealogical platform service.
Permitir la conexión entre miembros de l: Enable connection between members of the community.
Preservar la historia y el patrimonio de: Preserve the history and heritage of families.
Mejorar y personalizar la experiencia de: Improve and personalize the user experience.
Comunicarnos con usted sobre actualizaci: Communicate with you about updates and relevant events.
Implementamos medidas de seguridad técni: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information, including:
La información genealógica que usted reg: The genealogical information you register may be visible to other users according to the privacy settings you choose. You can control:
Who can see your personal information.
Quién puede ver la información de sus fa: Who can see information about your family members.
Si desea que su perfil sea visible en bú: Whether your profile is visible in searches.
No vendemos ni compartimos su informació: We do not sell or share your information with third parties for commercial purposes.
Solicitar la eliminación de su cuenta y: Request deletion of your account and data.
Exportar su información genealógica en f: Export your genealogical information in GEDCOM format.
Modificar sus preferencias de privacidad: Modify your privacy preferences at any time.
Utilizamos cookies esenciales para el fu: We use essential cookies for the platform's operation, including:
Cookies de sesión para mantener su inici: Session cookies to maintain your login.
Cookies de preferencias para recordar su: Preference cookies to remember your settings.
Si tiene preguntas sobre esta política d: If you have questions about this privacy policy, you can contact us through:
Nos reservamos el derecho de actualizar: We reserve the right to update this privacy policy. Significant changes will be notified through the platform or by email.
Al acceder y utilizar Mi Familia, usted: By accessing and using Mi Familia, you accept these terms and conditions in full. If you disagree with any part of these terms, you should not use this platform.
Mi Familia es una plataforma genealógica: Mi Familia is an open-source genealogical platform, which allows users to:
Registrar información de personas y fami: Register information about people and families.
Conectar con otros miembros de la comuni: Connect with other members of the community.
Importar y exportar datos genealógicos e: Import and export genealogical data in GEDCOM format.
Para utilizar la plataforma, usted debe:: To use the platform, you must:
Ser mayor de 18 años o contar con autori: Be over 18 years old or have authorization from a legal guardian.
Mantener la confidencialidad de su contr: Maintain the confidentiality of your password.
Notificar inmediatamente cualquier uso n: Immediately notify any unauthorized use of your account.
Al utilizar Mi Familia, usted se comprom: By using Mi Familia, you agree to:
Proporcionar información genealógica pre: Provide accurate and verifiable genealogical information.
Respetar la privacidad de otros usuarios: Respect the privacy of other users and their families.
No cargar contenido ofensivo, difamatori: Not upload offensive, defamatory or illegal content.
No utilizar la plataforma para fines com: Not use the platform for commercial purposes without authorization.
No intentar acceder a cuentas o datos de: Not attempt to access accounts or data of other users.
No utilizar bots, scripts o herramientas: Not use bots, scripts or automated tools without permission.
Usted es responsable del contenido que p: You are responsible for the content you post on the platform, including:
Información personal de familiares (con: Personal information of family members (with their consent when necessary).
Fotografías y documentos que suba a la p: Photographs and documents you upload to the platform.
Usted garantiza que tiene los derechos n: You warrant that you have the necessary rights to share the content you post and that such content does not infringe the rights of third parties.
La plataforma Mi Familia, incluyendo su: The Mi Familia platform, including its design, code, logos and original content, is an open-source project.
El contenido genealógico que usted aport: The genealogical content you contribute remains your property, granting the platform a license to display it according to your privacy settings.
Al registrar información de otras person: When registering information about other people (family members), you must:
Obtener consentimiento de personas vivas: Obtain consent from living persons before publishing their information.
Respetar los deseos de familiares que no: Respect the wishes of family members who do not wish to appear on the platform.
No publicar información sensible sin aut: Not publish sensitive information without authorization.
La plataforma se proporciona \"tal cual\: The platform is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We are not responsible for:
Inexactitudes en la información genealóg: Inaccuracies in genealogical information provided by users.
Pérdida de datos debido a circunstancias: Loss of data due to circumstances beyond our control.
Acciones de terceros que violen estos té: Actions by third parties that violate these terms.
Nos reservamos el derecho de suspender o: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account if:
You violate these terms and conditions.
Proporciona información falsa o engañosa: You provide false or misleading information.
Realiza actividades que perjudiquen a la: You engage in activities that harm the community or platform.
Usted puede solicitar la eliminación de: You can request the deletion of your account at any time from your profile.
Nos reservamos el derecho de modificar e: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will take effect upon publication on the platform. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes your acceptance of the new terms.
Estos términos se rigen por las leyes ap: These terms are governed by the applicable laws in your jurisdiction.
Para preguntas sobre estos términos, con: For questions about these terms, contact:
Donde encontrar más información de mis a: Where to find more information about my ancestors
Este proyecto ha sido realizado gracias: This project has been made possible thanks to the support of:
Mi Familia es un espacio creado para reu: Mi Familia is a space created to bring together families and their descendants. Our intention is to preserve the memory of our families and strengthen their bonds with our community and our relatives around the world.
En este sitio podrás registrar tu histor: On this site you can record your history, invite your family members, find relatives and discover connections you didn't know about, and thus become part of a living legacy that unites past, present and future.
Por favor ingresa la siguiente informaci: Please enter the following information to set up your profile.
Mi Familia es una plataforma genealógica: Mi Familia is an open-source genealogical platform, developed to help families explore the extent of their family roots.
Minimo 8 caracteres, mayusculas, minuscu: Minimum 8 characters, uppercase, lowercase, numbers and symbols
¿Tienes herencia cultural que deseas reg: Do you have ethnic heritage you wish to record?
¿Eres familiar de alguien con herencia c: Are you a family member of someone with registered ethnic heritage?
Ultimo pariente nacido en el lugar de or: Last relative born in the place of origin
He leido y acepto la: I have read and accept the
Debes aceptar los terminos y condiciones: You must accept the terms and conditions to continue
Crea un proyecto o selecciona uno existe: Create a project or select an existing one
Ve a Credenciales > Crear credenciales >: Go to Credentials > Create credentials > OAuth client ID
Agrega la URL de redireccion de arriba: Add the redirect URL from above
Copia el Client ID y Client Secret: Copy the Client ID and Client Secret
Agrega la URL de redireccion como \"Web\: Add the redirect URL as "Web" redirect URI
Copia el Application (client) ID y Direc: Copy the Application (client) ID and Directory (tenant) ID
En Certificates & secrets, crea un nuevo: In Certificates & secrets, create a new client secret
En API permissions, agrega Microsoft Gra: In API permissions, add Microsoft Graph > User.Read
Usa \"common\" para cuentas personales y: Use "common" for personal and work accounts, or a specific tenant ID.
En Settings > Valid OAuth Redirect URIs,: In Settings > Valid OAuth Redirect URIs, add the URL from above
Copia el App ID y App Secret desde Setti: Copy the App ID and App Secret from Settings > Basic
Cuando un usuario inicia sesion con OAut: When a user signs in with OAuth and no account exists with that email, one is created automatically.
Los emails de cuentas OAuth se considera: OAuth account emails are considered automatically verified.
Si un usuario OAuth tiene el mismo email: If an OAuth user has the same email as an existing account, they are linked automatically.
Este proveedor de inicio de sesion no es: This login provider is not enabled.
No se pudo completar el inicio de sesion: Could not complete sign in with
El proveedor OAuth no proporciono un ema: The OAuth provider did not provide an email.
No se permite el registro automatico con: Automatic registration is not allowed with this provider.
Configura el banner animado de fotos que: Configure the animated photo banner that appears on the dashboard.
Altura de las imagenes en el cintillo. R: Image height in the banner. Range: 60-200px.
Tiempo en segundos para un ciclo complet: Time in seconds for a full cycle. Lower = faster. Range: 10-120s.
Numero maximo de fotos a mostrar. Se sel: Maximum number of photos to display. Selected randomly. Range: 10-200.
El cintillo muestra fotos de los medios: The banner shows photos from media associated with people in the system.
Las imagenes se seleccionan aleatoriamen: Images are randomly selected and refreshed every 5 minutes (cached).
Al pasar el mouse sobre una imagen, la a: Hovering over an image pauses the animation and shows the person's name.
Al hacer clic en una imagen, se navega a: Clicking an image navigates to the person's profile.
Invitacion creada pero hubo un problema: Invitation created but there was a problem sending the email.
Especifica el numero de niveles en los q: Specifies the number of levels where text is written along an arc
Busca registros historicos via API de Fa: Search historical records via FamilySearch API
Busca personas historicas con datos estr: Search historical persons with structured data in Wikidata
Busca perfiles genealogicos en la comuni: Search genealogical profiles in the WikiTree community
Obtener en developer.familysearch.org. S: Get it at developer.familysearch.org. Without a key, it only generates search URLs.
Consultando FamilySearch, Wikipedia, Wik: Querying FamilySearch, Wikipedia, Wikidata and WikiTree...
